sentence.Network_en: DOLPHIN is expected to recurve after it traverses the ridge axis.
sentence.Network_cn: 白海豚将沿副热带高压脊西转西北面向北转东北移动.

sentence.Network_en: NAKRI will pass through the weakness between the high pressure and recurve.
sentence.Network_cn: 娜基莉将通过围绕它的两个高压中之弱点向北后转东北移动.

sentence.Network_en: NAKRI will traverse the ridge axis of the steering subtropical ridge and recurve.
sentence.Network_cn: 娜基莉将横过副热带高压脊的脊线向北后转东北移动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin recurvare 'bend (something) back', from re- 'back' + curvare 'to bend'

means.word_mean: 1. curve or bend (something) back or down
